caption.p: Correlation analysis of soil properties with genetic diversity and epigenetic diversity of D. angustifolia. TC: total organic carbon, TN: total nitrogen, C/N: carbon–nitrogen ratio, NH 4⁺-N: ammonium nitrogen, NO 3 −-N: nitrate nitrogen, TP: total phosphorus, TK: total potassium, AN: available nitrogen, AP: available phosphorus, AK: available potassium, Moisture: water content, ST: soil temperature; I: Shannon’s information index; PPL: percentage of Polymorphic Loci. * Correlation is significant at the 0.05 level.
